name: Moshi Monsters: Katsuma Unleashed
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS / 3DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

6 ACTION-PACKED WORLDS TO EXPLORE

JUMP, SPIN, DASH AND BASH YOUR WAY THROUGH 6 MONSTROUS WORLDS PACKED WITH BATTLES, BADDIES AND A HOST OF HIDDEN SECRETS!

DEFEAT ROBOT MOSHLINGS

FUR WILL FLY WITH EPIC BATTLES AGAINST AN ARMY OF DR. STRANGEGLOVE’S EVIL ROBOT MOSHLINGS!

EPIC BOSS BATTLES

PROVE YOUR SKILLS AS YOU BATTLE YOUR WAY TO THE ULTIMATE BOSS BATTLE WITH DR. STRANGELOVE HIMSELF!
